benefit.name: Efficient
benefit.text: Our team has reduced the work needed to create reusable UI components by giving you a reliable base to customize and expand on for fast and accurate development.

benefit.name: Fast
benefit.text: With ESL, there’s no need to write lengthy markup — our reusable UI components are small, but they’re designed to be the optimal building blocks for your content.

benefit.name: Light
benefit.text: We specially designed our reusable web components to work quickly and efficiently in browsers, cutting out the unnecessary code that takes a toll on user experience.

benefit.name: Powerful
benefit.text: While our web components may be small, they’re also universal, allowing you to mix and match them at will to create large components.

benefit.name: Tested
benefit.text: We test all of our utilities with unit tests, which means every new addition works just as expected.

benefit.name: Versatile
benefit.text: ESL doesn’t introduce any additional restrictions as it offers library and framework-agnostic web components that work with any tech stack of your choice.
